Product Description: Every day, Americans use more than 500 million plastic straws. Replace the waste with bambu's Bamboo Straws, the only straws that are certified organic. Made from USDA certified organic bamboo, these durable straws are biodegradable and compostable, and come with a cleaning brush so you can wash and reuse them for years before the end of their life. From juice to smoothies and even cocktails, these reusable bamboo straws are the natural way to reduce your waste
Keywords: Earth Hero, bambu, Bamboo, Straws, Reusable, Kitchen, Drinkware

Product Description: Did you know that Americans use over 500 million plastic straws per day? We know sipping from a straw is better for your teeth, and great for messy kids, seniors, and anyone in between– but single-use plastic straws are creating a huge waste problem. When you switch to Simply Straws, you do better for your health, and the planet. The classic Clear Glass Straw Set comes with a modern black and cream travel pouch made to fit both the 8" glass straw and cleaning brush, so your straw stays clean and ready to go no matter where you venture. Plus, it's BPA-free, so you can sip on even the hottest drinks toxin-free!
Keywords: Earth Hero, Glass, Straws, Reusable, Kitchen, Drinkware

Product Description: Help eliminate the 500,000,000 plastic straws Americans use every day with U Konserve's reusable Stainless Steel Straw + Straw Brush. This non-toxic stainless steel straw is ideal for cold drinks, cocktails, smoothies and more. Dishwasher safe, this waste-free set comes with a handy straw brush to get rid of leftover grime and grit. Say no to single-use straws and make the sustainable swap with this stainless steel alternative!
Keywords: Earth Hero, Konserve, Stainless Steel, Straws, Reusable, Kitchen, Drinkware

Product Description: It's time to #SuckResponsibly with FinalStraw's Biggie Collapsible Travel Straw! This badass straw is a convenient, durable alternative to single-use plastic straws, and is made from 100% silicone with a recycled plastic carrying case. It comes with a cleaning squeegee for easy clean up, and the case features a keychain clip, so you never have to worry about leaving your straw at home again. The straw itself is very wide, making it perfect for Boba, thick milkshakes, smoothies, and so much more. Stop sucking, and start living more sustainably with FinalStraw!
Keywords: Earth Hero, FinalStraw, Silicone, Recycled Plastic, Straws, Reusable, Kitchen, Drinkware, Travel, Collapsible

Product Description: Fact: about 30% of landfill waste is organic matter–all of which could be composted. BioBag's Vented Compost Bin makes it easy to divert your biodegradable waste away from our landfills thanks to the unique breathable design that was created to reduce the rate of bacterial build up (which leads to odors!) Made from post-consumer recycled plastic, this kitchen countertop sized bin allows moisture to escape and evaporate. With a sturdy carry handle and lockable lid, this compost bin is compatible with 2 gallon and 3 gallon compost bin bags! Plus, it's dishwasher safe–so cleaning up after composting is a breeze.
Keywords: Earth Hero, BioBag, Compost, Bin, Waste

Product Description: The Sophie Tank Dress –– our easiest and breeziest style yet. Made from a blend of TENCEL™ and Organic Cotton Jersey. You get the best of both worlds with the ultra-softness of TENCEL™ and breathability of soft cotton. This dress is the perfect weight to compliment your body –– not flimsy, but also not heavy. TENCEL™ is a fiber made from the pulp of wood trees. Both TENCEL™ and Organic Cotton are sustainable and biodegradable fabrics. Details include upper left chest pocket, relaxed ribbed crew neck, and a slit on the bottom right side.
Keywords: PopLinen, Dress, Tank, Sophie, Clothes

Best care on your Ada Tank is to wash cold with like colors and hang dry.

Product Description: Our high rise Organic Stretch Biker Short is designed for low to medium impact exercise, but it's so comfy you'll want to wear it everywhere. Most activewear is notoriously bad for the environment because it's made from synthetic materials that shed microplastics when washed. Our Organic Stretch is an entirely different story. While it's impossible to get the necessary stretch for activewear from pure cotton, we got pretty damn close with a blend of 92% Organic Cotton and only 8% Spandex.
